item.title: Sweden's herd immunity Covid-19 plan has 'failed miserably'

item.description:

item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: New Zealand, Christchurch, Canterbury, Australasia, Crime, National, Premium, South Island
item.title: Cold case murder: How did a 'kind, caring' son become a killer?
item.description: Jeremy Powell will be sentenced tomorrow for his role in the brutal murder of young Christchurch mum Angela Blackmoore 25 years ago. Herald senior journalist Kurt Bayer spoke to the parents of a "kind ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/jeremy_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The parents of Jeremy Powell can't comprehend that he's admitted his role in a brutal murder. Photo / Supplied

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/JeremyPowell_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The parents of Jeremy Powell can't comprehend that he's admitted his role in a brutal murder. Photo / Supplied

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/angelablackmoore3_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Laurie Anderson was "ecstatic" when Jeremy Powell pleaded guilty at the High Court in Christchurch earlier this year. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/laurieholdingphotopic_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Angela Blackmoore's partner Laurie Anderson still lives in the Christchurch house were she was killed - and has never given up hope for justice. Photo / Kurt Bayer
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/angelablackmoore2_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Laurie Anderson and Angela Blackmoore shortly before her murder. Photo / Kurt Bayer

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/angelablackmoorepic_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Angela Blackmoore was 10 weeks' pregnant and had a 2-year-old son when she was brutally murdered in 1995. Photo / File

item.title: NZ shares fall as strong kiwi weighs on exporters
item.description:
